title: Reading Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance - Chapter 11 -Part 2
description:
Phaedrus meets Hume and Kant. Will he be nice to them? Yes and no. Substance vs Change. Which one is more real?
NOTE: Phaedrus is not there for his doctorate. He's a freshman working on his BA.
The very useful page that informed me of my error: https://www.psybertron.org/timeline.html
